name: Scorpion Solitaire
description:
Classic games of Scorpion Solitaire. Attempt to make complete runs (King to Ace) in each suit by moving stacks of cards.

Totally free. No in-app purchases.

Play in four variations:

SCORPION - The classic game.
MOUSE - Like scorpion only the reserve cards can be played at any time.
FARMER'S WIFE - Build in alternate color suits.
CACHE - Like scorpion with four cache spots.
